EmailTemplate.subject: Track your helicopters wherever they are in the world with Honeywell

<http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Stay Connected Need to know where your helicopters are wherever they operate in the world? Sky Connect Tracker lll from Honeywell can help. If you operate helicopters, especially in remote or dangerous regions of the world you will understand the need to stay connected with the pilot, to know the location of the helicopter and to make it easy for communications to flow between helicopter and ground station.
The need to track real time flight status and the position of every helicopter in the fleet every minute of the day is paramount. The Sky Connect Tracker lll Iridium satellite communications system does that and much more. The system provides an all-in-one system that enables concurrent voice, text, aircraft fleet tracking, and real time flight data monitoring within a single box.
Sky Connect Tracker lll offers the following benefits:
- Easy to install, small, lightweight box - Ability to track helicopters using iridium satellite network - Enables a final position/status report to be sent, even after power is removed from the aircraft - Simultaneous tracking and texting capabilities, even during lengthy voice calls - Encrypted Sky Connect Tracker Agent infrastructure offers reliable, secure, and interruption-free performance - Interface with Honeywell’s Health Usage and Monitoring System “HUMS”, enabling improved safety through real-time alerting of potential maintenance problems <http://hwll.co/khx8>
Visit our web page If you would like to learn more about the Sky Connect Tracker lll visit our web pages for video, case studies and more.
